name: Grudge
description:
I am a solo developer

Grudge is a fantasy-based adventure sandbox MMO!
Collect fight explore build siege and more! Alone or with friends, players can choose their own path. Clear dungeons, gather resources and explore monuments. Level up stats and skills, collect pets and mounts, fight world bosses. Obtain epic equipment and components for crafting and building. Choose a location and build your stronghold, make alliances or wage war in the open world!

Grudge is a game that has features from multiple genre's blended to make a unique player experience, the included features range from genre's like fantasy mmorpg to survival games and even aspects from real time strategy games.

fantasy mmorpg features
========================
questing
dungeons
level up system
stat points
skills trees
partys
guilds
mounts
pets
equipment sets
legendary items
item auctions
pvp arena and shop
bank to store items
faction system--6 races 3 factions

survival features
========================
base building and upgrading
resource gathering like woodcutting, mining, herbalism and fishing
hunting for food
campfire cooking for food
furnaces for smelting metal ore
item researching
storage containers
crafting benches for equipment, consumables and deployables
crafting stations for siege weapons, ships and vehicles
open world monuments and interest points
loot drop on death

real time strategy features
============================
stable for purchasing faction mounts and upgrading pets
Armory for training guards and mercenaries
Arsenal for building ships, vehicles, defense towers and siege weapons
player controlled npc guards, defense towers and siege weapons
player vs player open world siege battle
